Title: Disease transmitting fleas -- How to avoid getting fleas
Designer: Beijing New National Painting Research Society (北京新国画研究会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: This poster is part of a series with the title "Everybody joins the patriotic hygienic campaign to prevent epidemics， Thoroughly defeat the germ warfare of American imperialism, " (彻底打散美帝国主义的细菌战，人人都来参加爱国防疫运动). The slogan on the right-hand side (人人都来参加爱国防病卫生运动) has been cropped.The poster was published in August 1952. The first impression was from July of the same year.Various ways to recognize and prevent the spread of disease through fleas and other insects are depicted.
